message: What kind of sound effects do you need? Is there some kind of register or what sounds are needed? I like to suggest some otherworldly sound effects, depending on whats needed :)
We haven't begun any real sound work yet, we're not entirely sure how we're going to go about it.

There are many people who have contacted, offering their services, but we have yet to formalize an agreement with anyone. If you (or anybody else) are interested in helping out, just shoot me an email - zib@starryexpanse.com
Hopefully you would be able to get all of the original sounds from Cyan.
That would be of-course the best thing to happen!
Well of course that'd be ideal, assuming they're high enough quality to use still.
you could still upsample or alter the samples in some way to make them more complex

Well realMyst seems to have mostly used the original sounds but replaced a handful. And they don't sound too bad. So presumably if Cyan can get high quality versions of (most) of the sounds from Myst, they can for Riven too.
